message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $10000. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable. If you're interested, please respond with 'buy' to seal the deal.
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. I trust your assessment and would like to purchase this high-quality product.

If you're willing to take the risk, please let me know if you'd like to buy it.
